definitions.text: an implement used in the practice of a vocation
the means whereby some act is accomplished
examples: my greed was the instrument of my destruction
science has given us new tools to fight disease

definitions.text: a person who is controlled by others and is used to perform unpleasant or dishonest tasks for someone else

examples: The convertible tooled down the street

definitions.text: ride in a car with no particular goal and just for the pleasure of it
